body:
How to Play

It's as easy as it sounds, you answer the question above you; then give a question of your own for the next person to answer.

I'll start:
How did you find out about Avicus?
body_tagged:
How to Play

It's as easy as it sounds, you answer the question above you; then give a question of your own for the next person to answer.

I'll start:
How did you find out about Avicus?
title: [GAME] QnA Chain

replies.body:
Lol, I had a déjà vu... I think this game has already been shared on the forums... anyway....
Two years ago a player on an other server asked me to play walls with him and he messaged me the IP then that's how I found it ...

Who was the first person who ever killed you on Avicus? (or atleast the first one you can remember xP)

replies.body:
